name: OR_CASE_SURG_RSC
description: The OR_CASE_SURG_RSC table contains OR management system case surgeons/staff/resources.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the lines of the surgical staff resource information in the case.

columns.name: SRG_STF_RSC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgeon/staff/resource record.

columns.name: START_OFFSET
columns.description: The start time for the surgeon/staff/resource. It is measured in minutes relative to the beginning of the case.

columns.name: END_OFFSET
columns.description: The end time for the surgeon/staff/resource. It is measured in minutes relative to the beginning of the case.

columns.name: REQUIRED_YN
columns.description: Yes/No flag which indicates whether the surgeon/staff/resource is required for the case.

columns.name: SURG_REC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value which indicates the type of the surgeon/staff/resource. The possibilities are Surgeon, Anesthesia Staff, Operating Room, Surgical Staff, Surgical Equipment, Anesthesia Equipment, or Instrument.

columns.name: RESOURCE_TYPE
columns.description: The specific type of the surgical resource within the case.

columns.name: LINE_INDEX
columns.description: Line index value of the surgeon/staff/resource within the case.

columns.name: BATCH_ASSIGN_YN
columns.description: Yes/No flag which indicates whether or not the surgeon/staff/resource was assigned to the case through the batch assign method of the Assign Resources option within OR management system.

columns.name: MOD_START_OFFSET
columns.description: The start time of the resource, in minutes relative to the start of the case, if it has been shortened or lengthened.

columns.name: MOD_END_OFFSET
columns.description: The end time of the resource, in minutes relative to the start of the case, if it has been shortened or lengthened.

columns.name: IMPLANT_TRAY_ID
columns.description: Stores the implant tray associated with the pool.
